O, filhs, pus yeu he a vos complit aquest libre, le qual es le derier de la sciencia de medicina, per le compliment de lu so consequit la fi en lu, e per las exposicios de lu, e per las declaracios de lu, es a mi vist que yeu complesca aquel a vos am aquest tractat, le qual es partida de la operacio am ma, so es cyrurgia.	O children, as you have completed this book, which is the last of the medical science series, in honor of your birth and for all that you have learned from it, I deem it fitting to present you with this treatise on surgery - a part of my own work.
Quar la operacio am ma es prostrada en nostre regio e en nostre temps de tot privada, entro que fort leu peric la sciencia de lu, e le vistigi de lu es ostat; e no romasero de lu sino alcunas petitas descripcios en les libres dels Antics, les quals mudero las mas e endevenc ad aquels error e heyssitacio entro que son clausas las entencios de lu e es elonguada la forsa de lu e l’art.	The work has been laid waste in our realm and during our times, being wholly deprived of it; so little attention is given to the science of it, and its knowledge and practice are preserved only in small descriptions in the books of the Ancients, which have altered them greatly, leading to errors and heresies into which they have fallen and the essence and art has been lost.
E es vist a mi que yeu vivifique aquela am ordenacio de aquest tractat en aquela segon la via de exposicio e de declaracio e de abreviacio; e per que vengua am las formas dels ferramentz de cautheri e dels autres instrumentz de la obra cum sia per addicio de la declaracio, e per preparacio de lu, la qual causa es necessaria. Mays la causa per la qual no es atrobat bo artifex am la sieua ma en aquest nostre temps, es quar la art de medicina es longua, e que cove le sieu actor denant aquo esser excercitat en la sciencia de anotomia la qual recontec Gualia entro que sapia les juvament dels membres e las formas de aquels, e la conjunctio e la separacio de lor; e haia la conoyssensa dels osses, dels nervis e dels lacertz, e·l nombre de aquels, e la egrecio de lor; e de las venas pulsatils e de las quietas, e dels locs del eyssiment de lor.	Mays la causa per cui non è atrovat che un artista sia davanti al nostro tempo, è perché l'arte della medicina è lunga e richiede all'artista di essere esercitato nella scienza dell'anatomia, come Gualterus ha saputo le giustapposizioni dei membri e delle forme corporee, la congiunzione e la separazione tra loro; ed era esperto negli ossi, nei nervi e nelle vene, nei nomi di quelli, nella loro struttura; ed anche sulle vene pulsanti e quelle tranquille e sugli spostamenti del sangue.
E per aquo ditz Ypocras que am u nom es mot, mays en l’obra petit, e majorment en la art de la ma.	PER AQUO DIZ YPORCRA: QUE OU LHE NÃO HAVEREM DE TEMOR; MAIS EM A TARDE, E MENOS EN EL TRABALHO PEQUENO, E MAIS ANTES NO ARTE GRANDE.

I saw a physician and it happened that he had caused an abscess in the neck of a woman, leading to some ruptured arteries causing a great amount of blood flowing inside her which ultimately resulted in the woman's death among many others.
E vi un autre metge que pres que el traguera una peyra d’un home le qual avia procesit en sa etat, e la peyra era gran, e venguet a lu e trayssec aquela peyra am un tros de la vesiqua, per que aquel home al tertz dia es mort.	I will tell you another parable that is somewhat similar to the one about the traitorous servant and the stone. There was a man who had processed in his estate (which means he had faced many challenges or hardships) and the stone he lifted was very large, and as he walked with it, it tore at a piece of his flesh. As a result, that man died on the third day.
E yeu ja apelat fuy a estrayre aquela, e vi que per la grandesa de la peyra e per la disposicio del malaute conogui subre lu que morira.	The year ago I heard the news that she had gone abroad, and I knew from the size of the rock and the condition of her illness that she would not survive.
E vi un autre metge le qual prenia stipendic de un duc de nostra terra per cyrurgia, e endeven a un crastrat negre le qual era deves lu fractura en la coyssa de lu; e perparec le metge am la sua ignorancia, estrayssec la fractura, sobre la plagua, am pulvinas e astelas am forta strectura, e no layssec a la plagua espiracio.	In our land there was another surgeon who received a fee of one ducat to perform surgery; and when he came upon the black cyst which was causing him pain in his leg, the surgeon used his ignorance, tore open the cyst on the pillow with forceps and bandages, but did not remove it properly from its root.
E aprop le desliet segons los sieus desiriers, e aprop le relieg, e aprop le leyssec per alcus jorns e comandec que nos deslies le liament; e estec ayssi entro que la coyssa e·l pe foro apostematz, e pervenguet a perdicio. Capitol .xix.	The word "Capitol" originates from Latin, specifically the term "Caput Mili," which translangs to 'head of a soldier' or 'battle helmet.' In English, it was adopted in the late Middle Ages as "capitolium." Over time, this word evolved into its modern form – Capitol.

Quan extrophulos so de flecma e de humors fregas e no so hobedientz a digistio per medicinas e tu voys la digistio de aquelas leugerament, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri conquau la forma del qual es aquesta seguen, havent dos extremitatz hubertas per que yesca le fum deves le cauteri per l’autra extremitat, e pausa aquel ignit sobre aquel apostema una veguada, e autre si indigeyses de aquel, entro que pervengua al preon del apostema.	Quan extrophilus is of fleam and leeches, and therein you shall apply the medicines as follows: lightly puncture with a hot iron to give it the desired shape, having two pointed tips through which the smoke of the heated iron should be applied on one side. Leave the heated iron on the abscess for one turn, and if needed again, do so until you reach the edge of the abscess.
E si l’apostema es pauca, lahoras pausa le cauteri segon la quantitat del apostema, e aprop leyssa le per tres jorns e pausa sobre lu coto enfus en boder entro que sia remaugut aquo que·l foc ha comburit.	If the abscess is small, leave it to heal on its own according to the amount of abscess; in addition, apply a warm compress over the affected area three times daily until the heat has completely dissipated wherein the pus was burned off by the heat.
E aprop cura aquel am enguent e tentas e draps entro que sia sanat.	B) Ensure the fabric you use is clean and dry before washing it with detergent or bleach.
E la forma de la cannula o deu cauteri a tal es comveyter.	The shape of the cannula or electrode depends on its specific use and function. Different types have different shapes to fit their intended purposes in various medical procedures.

De cauterizacio de malautia del pulmo e de tos.	Treatment for tuberculosis of the lung and chronic cough.
Quan tos e malautia de pulmo so de humiditatz fregas e le malaute no ha febre ni tisic e es malautia antiqua, lahoras cauterisa aquel am dos cauteris sobre la furcula en les locz depremegutz leontz e buoytz; e am autra cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz entre dos mamillos; e sia le cauteri clavilh segon la forma precedent. Capitol .xxvi.	Here is the information in English, with capitalization and punctuation added for clarity:
De cauterizacio del stomac.	Stomach cauterization (also known as gastric ablation or gastric mucosal resurfacing) is a medical procedure that involves the application of heat, lasers, electricity, or radiofrequency to destroy tissue in certain parts of the stomach lining. This treatment may be used for various conditions such as metabolic syndrome, type 2 diabetes, and obesity by reducing gastric volume and altering hormone production related to hunger and satiety. However, please note that any medical terminology or translation should be confirmed with a healthcare professional.
Quan veno en l’estomac freg e motas humiditatz entro que aquel extrazo de la sua compleccio e so multiplicatz raumases a lu, e si tu continuas las manieyras de curacio e no confereyso, lahoras cove que le malaute sia sobre le sieu dos ressupinat, e extenda las suas mas e las suas coysas, e aprop cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris: an un cauteri dejos le pietz per la quantitat d’un dit am cauteri clavilh, e am dos cauteris dejos del dos costatz del cauteri, entro que vengua la figura de cauteri triangulada; e elonga entre els que no sian ajustatz que faran poyredura.	When the pus enters the stompit and moist swellings occur inside due to this inflammation, if you continue with the treatment methods and do not stop them, then soon the disease will spread on his back and extend its veins and limbs; therefore, cauterize that area with three caustics: one less than a grain of wheat in quantity at the armpit, and two more at the edges of the incision, so it takes the shape of a triangular cautery; elongate between them which are not adjusted to make an ointment.
E si la profunditat del cauteri la quantitat de les dos terses de la grocesa de la codena.	The depth of the caudal cauterization depends on the quantity of third-degree burns of the lower limb.
E sia la figura del cauteri segon aquesta forma ses addicio, E si vols, cauteriza am gran cauteri en le mieg loc del estomac segon aquesta forma; et aquest sia un cauteri segon la forma de cercle segon aquesta forma:	S is the figure of a caustic according to this form, and if you wish, make a large caustic on the lower part of the abdesteem following this shape; and it shall be a caustic in the shape of a circle as follows.
E sia cauterizat l’estomac punctan ad aquel que de aquest cauteri es spaventat: e es que tu senhes sobre l’estomac punt segon la quantitat que voles am tenta, e aprop cauteriza aquel am cauteri en les puntz; e aprop cura aquel am la curacio qu’es precedita entro que sia sanat.	E be the stomach cautioned at that which of this caution is frightened: and thou shalt lay thine hands upon the stalled stomach according to the quantity which thou wishest to try, and then cauterize that with the caution at those points; and then heal that with the healing as it precedes when it becomes healthy.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter XXVII (27) of the English language Wikipedia edition is titled "Capitol." This chapter provides information about the United States Capitol, a building in Washington D.C., that serves as home to the U.ebrchstaffs and Senate chambers of the United States Congress. The structure also includes other important rooms such as the Hall of the House, Rotunda, and National Statuary Hall Collection. Additionally, the Capitol Visitor Center is a tourist attraction that showcases exhibits about American history and democracy.

E es aquesta la forma del cauteri:	No, "E" is not the symbol for a cautionary warning. In English and other languages, the symbol that represents a caution or danger sign is typically an exclamation mark (!) along with specific icons indicating the nature of the hazard (like flames for fire, a lightning bolt for electricity, etc.).

Capitol .xxix.	Act V, Scene III of William Shakespeare's tragedy "Julius Caesar" takes place on the steps of the Roman Senate House or Curia Pompeii in Rome. The setting is significant as it represents a central location for political discourse and decision-making within ancient Rome. This scene occurs immediately after Julius Caesar has been assassinuted by his fellow senators, including Brutus and Cassius. It opens with the entrance of Mark Antony seeking permission to speak at Caesar's funeral and sets the stage for one of Shakespeare's most famous speeches: "Friends, Romans, countrymen, lend me your ears." The scene is pivotal in its portrayal of political manipulation and oratory prowess as Antony turns public sentiment against Brutus and the other conspirators by skillfully using Caesar's will to provoke a riotous response from the crowd.

In addition to these rows, add two more rows along each side of the sternum and make three vertical lines between the clavicles and axillary arteries. De cauterizacio de ydropici.	Cauterization of lesions.
Cauteri no catz en ydropici sino en alcinte3 propriament.	The original sentence in Catalan, "Cauteri n'en cau de l'acuitat que d'una passió propiament," translates to English as: "The chain does not draw from the urgency but from a proper cause." Here is how we arrive at this translation:
Quan tu curas le ydropic am las manieyras de curacio las quals havem ditas en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que aquel cauterizes am quatre cauteris en le cercuit del embelic e am un cauteri sobre l’estomac, e am autre cauteri sobre le fietge, e am autre cauteri sobre la melsa, e am dos cauteris entre les spondils del dos, e un cauteri en lo dreyt del pietz, e am autre cauteri sobre l’estomac.	I treat you with leeches and apply compressions as described in the division, but do not administer your treatment in the form of bloodletting; instead, four cauterizations on the edge of the umbilicus, one upon the stomach, another upon the liver, another upon the spleen, two between the vertebrae of the spine, and one more at the right hip.
E la quantitat de la profunditat del cauteri sia propdana a la spicitut de la codena.	The amount of depth in the cautionary tale is proportional to the severity of the consequences.
E aprop layssa le cauteri ubert per so que gete brac per lonc temps.	A properly applied caulking to the sealant surface will ensure that you have long-lasting protection from water ingress and leakage.
E no evacuas le malaute de curacio aprop le cauteri am aquo que cove per que sian agreguadas a lu doas entencios, e sira festinada a lu am ajutori sanacio.	E does not bring about the healing of illness through cautionary use of water that is added to aid in prayers; rather it seeks the assistance of medical science.
La forma del cauteri am lo qual es cauterizat lo ventre sia clavilh segon que la forma de aquel es desus precedent, e es aquel am le qual es cauterizat le dos sia olivar segon qu’es precedent a la sua forma.	The shape of the caudal appendix which is to be cauterized has the form of a clavicle; hence, its shape comes before that one, and it is the one where both sides are olive-shaped following its previous form.

If you want to core your hair, here is the method for doing so using a hot iron: Firstly, stop applying any products on that area of scalp where you intend to thin out the hair and let it dry completely. Then heat up your hot curling iron until it reaches high temperature (usually around 180-205°C/356-401°F). Holding a comb in one hand, place sections of about 2 cm of thickness between the teeth and run the heated curling iron through them from root to tip. Do not leave the hot iron on any section for more than 10 seconds as it can damage your scalp. Repeat this process until you have thinned out all desired areas, then let everything cool down before applying any after-care products or styling tools. Remember that using a hot curling iron is an at-home alternative to professional thinning techniques like laser hair removal and should only be performed by individuals with experience in handling such equipment.

Capitol .ii.	Capital (also spelled capitol) is the city or town that functions as the seat of government and administrative center of a country, state, province, region, or other similar entity. In some countries, the capital is also where the head of state resides and where many embassies are located. The term "capital" should not be confused with "capitol," which refers to a building in which a legislative body meets.

Capitol .viii.	In the United States, the federal legislative body is known as Congress and consists of two houses: the Senate and the House of Representatives. The term "Capitol" refers to the building where both these chambamoons convene in Washington D.C., which is officially called the Capitol Building or simply the U.S. Capitol. It serves as the home for Congress, housing offices, committee rooms, and a chamber where legislative sessions are held. The Senate meets on the second floor of the north wing, while the House of Representatives occupies the south wing's lower level.

Capitol .x.	In the English language, "Capitol" refers to a building where legislative bodies meet to discuss and pass laws. The most well-known example is the United States Capitol in Washington D.C., which houses both chambcups of Congress - the Senate and the House of Representatives. This iconic building with its distinctive dome symbolizes democracy and the principles upon which the United States was founded, such as freedom, justice, and equality for all citizens.

e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	The distance between two points can be found using their longitude and latitude values without involving any units of measurement. In other words, the difference in degrees or minutes of longitude and latitude will give us the angular distance between those points on the globe. However, to convert this into actual physical distance (such as kilometers), we need to take into account the Earth's shape and size using formulas such as Haversine or Vincenty's formulae.

Capitol .xv.	XIV is the Roman numeral for the number 14 in English. Roman numerals are a numeric system that originated in ancient Rome and were used throughout Europe until as late as the 19th century. They employ combinations of letters from the Latin alphabet (I, V, X, L, C, D, M) to represent values. In this system, XIV represents 10 (X), subtracted by one (I) before four (IV). Therefore, it equals 14 in decimal notation.

Capitol .xvii.	Capital seventeen or CAPITAL XVII is often used in legal documents, official papers, and contracts to denote the number "17" using Roman numerals. In English, this would be written as "seventeprise." However, note that capital letters (uppercase) are not typically used for writing numbers such as seventeen; instead, we use lowercase letters when referring to these in normal text: "xvii". Therefore, the most common and correct way to write it in English would simply be "17" or if you prefer Roman numerals, "XVII."

This procedure is often carried out by a dentist or an oral surgeon when necessary due to various reasons like severe decay, advanced gum disease, overcrowding, impacted wisdom teeth, fractures, infection or preparation for orthodontic treatment.

Capitol .xl.	In English, the term "Capitol" generally refers to a building in which a legislative body meets. For instance, the United States Capitol is where both chambeis of Congress – the Senate and the House of Representatives – convene to debate laws, pass resolutions, and carry out other governmental functions. It's an iconic structure situated on Capitol Hill in Washington D.C., serving as a symbol of American democracy for over 200 years since its completion in 1800.

Capitol .lx.	The US Capitol, located in Washington D.cu, is the home of Congress and serves as a symbol of democracy in America. Designed by William Thornton and later modified by others including Benjamin Latrobe and Charles Bulfinch, its construction began in 1793 under President George Washington's administration. The building showcases neoclassical architecture with iconic features such as the Rotunda, National Statuary Hall, and the Library of Congress. As a UNESCO World Heritage Site, it is visited by millions of tourists every year who come to admire its rich history and remarkable design.

An inguinal (or groin) hernia occurs when tissue pushes through a weakness in the abdomebody wall near the inguinal canal, which is found in the lower portion of your abdomen, near the groin area.

Capitol .lxiv.	English: Act IV, Scene V of Shakespeare's play "Julius Caesar" is titled "Capitol." In this scene, a conspiracy against Julius Caesar unfolds as his friends and allies plan to assassinate him on the Ides of March. The senators Cassius and Brutus discuss their motives for wanting to remove Caesar from power before he can potentially turn into a tyrant like his contemporary, King Philip II of Macedon. They also persuade Casca to join them in their plot. This pivotal scene sets the stage for the dramatic assassination that follows later in Act III and is central to the tragic downfall of Caesar as well as the ensuing power struggles among Rome's leaders.

E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	The person lays on their back, elevates the soles of their feet and places a weight upon which they have previously stood or a pillow; then anoints the extremity of the incision with oil, almond paste, or fenugreek seeds. They introduce that into the rectum and express it out in two to three emissions vigorously until completely evacuated. Then remove the instrument from the rectum and the person lifts their buttocks off the cradle.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament. De curacio de las plaguas.	Treatment of the Plagues.

E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas. E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	In the beginning, when we start discussing the simple cases, let's keep in mind that the discussion of complex cases will come at the onset of chapter three.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	When you notice a simple scalp wound that is not a fracture, consider the following if it's a minor cut or more serious injury, and only slightly bleeding; and there are significant swelling and concerns about an ongoing infection with abscess formation, then you should suspect and perform cranial irrigation as soon as possible without delay. E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas. E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc. E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada. E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	B) Without any doubt at all, water alone will freeze when it's not in your presence and under the sun'amo de drago.

Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	If you've broken a small bone in your foot, elevate it as soon as possible. Additionally, applying ice wrapped in a cloth can also provide relief. However, if you're experiencuing severe pain, numbness, or cannot bear weight on your foot, please seek medical attention immediately.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor. De las plaguas del col.	From the depths of the coal mine.

De las plaguas del ventre.	From the stings of the abdomen.

E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil. E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	Here is my recount of the entire situation and declaration:
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	When the cloud is small and there's a slight cause of disturbance in it, making it difficult to reduce that, at times this hour it becomes one of two ways: either due to the smallness of the disruption as we have mentioned, or when the cloud has come down with inflation because of the coldness of the air.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda. Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	En el documento, se presenta la siguiente forma de lu:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	A slice of acute triangle and another non-acute one; the tip is subtle, and it's not a matter of thinness (slimness), but rather slightly obtuse by a small amount.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	So the rain has increased and the fields are flooded; therefore, it is necessary for the soil's composition to be restored according to its natural form, in its own place, if possible on the same land, as this is optimal.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	Mays quan la disruption is widespread, and it's located in the lower part of the abdamenow you feel pain on your left side, then relax your legs more to the left that your head; and if it's located in the upper part of the abdomen, now you will experience a headache and nausea.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	If the disruption is in one of the two parts of the body, then pause your thinking and consideration for some time so that the affected party may be given priority over the other.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	In English, this would translate to: "Jesus said that you should provide assistance in the great floods and during minor ones as well." E es milhor en aquest loc que oli e que les autres olis.	E is better in this place than old and than the others smelled.
E semblantment aministra fenda de oli en tota fleubotomia am la qual fleubotomes las venas deves la prohibicio de cors de sanc, e fan aquo tyriaca alfadoc e sagzenea quan es pausat de la una de aquelas sobre le loc, quar le sanc es subtiliat e es revolvut quan es gros.	Apparently, a method called bloodletting was used throughout history to treat various illnesses by letting out some blood from the body through cutting certain veins. It involved using tools like lancets and lancet-like instruments when it was time for treatment. The idea behind this practice was that removing "bad" or excessive blood would restore balance in the body, which at the time was thought to be a subtle but powerful way of healing certain conditions.
E si en le loc de la fleubotomia es engendrat gran apostema, quar motas veguadas accideys, e majorment ad aquel que no es stat sangnat sino aquela veguada, o en la apercio de la vena pauca, e lahoras tu coyta, e pausa sobre le loc sponja infuza en aygua e sal, un pauc scalfada, e strenh aquela per una hora, quar es dissolvut.	If a bruise is formed at the site of phlebotomy, multiple complications may arise, especially in those who are not anemic but rather have a visible discoloration or when there is only slight vein visibility upon inspection; such individuals may experience pain and swelling. To treat this, apply a cold compress on the affected area for about an hour to help dissolve it.

Capitol .xcvii.	In English, the Roman numeral "Capitol xcvii" translates to "97." The Roman numerals stand for different values as follows: C=100, XC=90 (X before C), VI=6; thus when combined in this order we get 100 - 10 + 7 = 97.

Capitol primier.	First-class capital or first-class city refers to a designation given by some governments, such as the United States and Canada, that confers special status upon certain cities due to their importance in terms of population, economy, or other factors. Mota diversitat de fractura segon diversitat del membre.	Type of fracture according to the affected limb.
E sapias que las specias de fractura son diversas segon la diversitat dels membres, quar fractura del os de la camba es diversa de la fractura del os del cap; e la fractura del os del pietz es divers de la fractura del os del dos; e semblantment totz les autres membres son diverses entre lor.	The ways of breaking vary according to the variety of members, so a shinbone break is different from a skull break; and a foot bone break is different from a backbone break; likewise all other limbs have diverse types of breaks.
E yeu venc am rememoracio de tota specia de fractura, expausada en le sieu capitol distincta del autre.	Here is a memorial of the entirety of fracture types, distinguished in their own right within its capital (the skull). Mota diversitat de fractura en si meteyssa.	Type of fracture in the right tibia.

The types of bone fractures are diverse; an arc-shaped fracture occurs when they happen in the shaft (diaphysis), and some variations occur along the length of the bone: there are also fractures due to compression, impaction, or torsion, both resulting from trauma and not. Mays Ypocras, a traditional medieval cordial or wine-based drink, is not distilled in the sense of being subjected to a process involving heat and separation through vaporization like alcoholic spirits. The types of bone fractures are varied, and the causes are different, none of which is caused by a percussive blow from space, as the impact pushes the entire bone inward, leaving the bone behind it just as if it were struck with a stick, thus this type of fracture is called an avulsion; or the blade penetrates a part of the bone and cuts through the flesh without passing into the innermost layer of the tissue; and this type of faster is called complete dislocation.

Capitol .v.	In English, the word "capitol" refers to a building in which a legislative body of government meets. It is often associated with large stately structures that house state or national parliaments and congresses for discussions, debates, and the passing of laws. The most famous Capitol is argcuably the United States Capitol located in Washington D.C., where both houses of Congress – the Senate and the House of Representatives – convene to perform their duties as defined by the U.S. Constitution.

Capitol .ix.	IX is the Roman numeral that corresponds to the number 9 in English. Numerals are a system of symbols used to represent numbers. The Romans developed their own set, known as Roman numerals, which remain in use today for certain applications such as page numbers, clock faces, and outlining hierarchical information (e.g., chapters or sections).

Capitol .x.	In the context of governance, "capitol" usually refers to a building or complex where a legislative body meets to make laws and discuss political issues. For example, in the United States, there is a Capitol Building located in Washington D.C., which houses both the Senate and House of Representatives – collectively known as Congress. These two bodies are responsible for creating federal laws.

Mays si le malaute es leugier, lahoras cove que am lu que autre causa sia suspenduda, per so que grave aquel, quar la dislocacio retorna tantost.	If the illness is benign, treatment should be continued until another cause is suspected, as this condition could become serious if left untrewed and lead to further complications.
E es reduzit eysament segon autra manieyra: e es que sia ficat en terra un fust lonc le cap del qual sia redon de figura, ayssi cum pilo de mortier, que no sia gros ni subtil, e aprop sia pausat dejos le malaute; pus que so pausatz sobre·l cap del fust draps leons, e·l malaute sia stant segon la longitut del fust, e aprop sia extenduda la ma de lu a las partidas dejos del autra part; e sia extendut le cos de lu del autre part am fortaleza, quar la junctura retorna al sieu loc am velocitat.	E is reduzit in proportions according to another model: it has a long stem with an elliptical head at the top of which there is a round knob (as a mortar's pestle), that is neither thick nor thin, and its weight balanced over the center; then it is attached by straps on the cap of the stick in the direction of the length of the stick, and extended down to both ends; and its handle extends out from either end with strong strength so that the junction returns to its place with velocity.
E si es dificil reduccio de lu per totas las causas que havem ditas, lahoras usa de aquesta cura: e es que tu prenguas un fust la quantitat del qual sia en le lonc de dos brasses, e latitut de aquel sia de quatre ditz, e la grossetut de lu sia aleujat en le preon del tittilic segon aquesta forma:	It is difficult to reduce fever in all cases due to the reasons mentioned above; however, you may use this remedy. E aprop sobre le cap redon sian liatz drap leons per so que·l fust no ledesca le malaute.	A prophecy about the Red Sun of Leon tells that as long as it shines, there will be no misfortune in the land.

E cum le intrament de lu es complit segon quascuna maniera que es a tu possibla, e lahoras cove que tu pauses dejos le titillic spera de lana de engual quantitat; e aprop pauza emplastre perparat de polvera de moli am enses e album de huou sobre tot le muscle, ayssi quo es revolvut desus, e aprop strenh dejos le titillic am strictura decent; e le liament sia revolvut sobre le emplastre, e la ma de lu sia annectida al col de lu, e sia leyssat, e no sia mauguda la ma de lu per vii dias. E si tot aysso es fayt e aprop vii dias es desliat le liament e la junctura no es fermada, e le emplastre e la strictura son reduzitz sobre lu alcunas veguadas, e no es fermada e catz e no pot elevar aquel bras a las partidas desus, lahoras sapias que·ls nervis de lu, les quals so al cap del muscle, ja so inscizes o extendutz o mollificatz, e sapia que la junctura nul temps no sira ficada en loc sieu.	If the fracture is not properly immobilized and allowed to heal without sufficient time (approximately three weeks), the plaster casts may have loosened and become unstable, preventing the muscle from contracting or elevating that part of the body. It's crucial to know that at times, these nerves which are at the head of the muscle can become loose or stretched out or relaxed, thus it's important for the joint not to be fixed in one position for too long.

De curacio de dislocacio del coyde.	Treatment of the labrum tear in the shoulder joint.

Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter Twenty-Eight (28) of the United States Constitution is commonly referred to as "Capital" or "Congress." This chapter establishes the legislative branch of the federal government, known as Congress, and outlines its structure, powers, and limitations. It also includes provisions related to the election and terms of representatives and senators, requirements for passing bills into law, and regulations regarding impeachment proceedings against officials in the executive and judicial branches.
De curacio de dislocacio de malassen, so es de la junctura que es entre·l bras e la ma.	The Malassez Cyst is a type of cyst that occurs at the junction between the arm and the hand. It's a rare benign lesion often associated with the roots of impacted or partially eruptculed teeth, especially in the mandible region (lower jaw). These cysts can also be found within the bones themselves. Treatment usually involves surgical removal to avoid potential complications like infection or damage to surrounding tissues and structures.
Malassen de la ma alcunas vetz es deslocada, e la reduccio de la dislocacio de lu es leugiera, e·l contrari es de las autras juncturas, mays empero cove que sia velocitat en la reduccio de lu en la hora en la qual es deslocada, denant que le loc sia apostemat o que accida en lu apostema caut.	The translation from Old Occitan to English is as follows:
E la reduccio de la dislocacio de lu es que tu pauses la junctura de la ma del malaute sobre una taula e le ministre extenda la ma de aquel, e le metge pause la sua ma o o la sua palma sobre la iminencia de la junctura, e empellisca aquela entro que retorne al sieu loc. Mays empero cove que sia considerat si la palma ja es ostada al ventre de la ma, lahoras le malaute pause le dos de la sua ma sobre una taula deves la extencio e la reduccio; e si la dislocacio es precedent deves le dos de la ma, lahoras sia la posicio de la ma de aquel intrinicequement sobre la taula, per so que la ma del metge caja sobre aquela iminencia de la junctura. E donc si retorna tantost, bon es; e sino, lahoras strenh aquela am empastre cedant le apostema e layssa aquel; e no iteres aquo, quar sino, no soferta ni no podes sobre la reduccio de lu pus que passan a lu dias.	If you apply it soon enough, good luck! But if not, let the swelling subside and leave that abscess alone; don't touch or treat it anymore until it has gone down over the days that follow. Mays empero la junctura roman segon la sua tortuositat; e no notz al malaute alcuna causa, sino que la ma es mollificada e no pot strenher alcuna causa; lahoras sapias que les nervis son trincatz o trissatz, e lahoras no es engen en lu sino que sia strenhuda am cauteri prop le cazament de lu e fort leu aquo confereys alcuna causa. Mays si le movement de lu es ostat e accideys en lu alcuna gravitat, lahoras leniys aquela am aygua cauda e am fricacio alcunas veguadas, entro que sia alleujat.	The movement of the sun causes various changes in the environment such as temperature and light intensity. During its absence at night, plants undergo processes like respiration where they consume oxygen and release carbon dioxeide to produce energy for growth and other metabolic activities. Additionally, photosynthesis occurs during daylight hours when sunlight is available for this crucial process in plant life that converts light energy into chemical energy stored as glucose while releasing oxygen as a byproduct.

Capitol .xxx.	Capital XXX.
De la curacio de dislocacio dels spondils del dos.	The treatment of scoliosis in the dorsal vertebrae.

E senhal de aquo es que la egestio del malaute es fora-eyssida ses voluntat, e no pot retenir aquela; e motas veguadas so mollificatz alcus membres de lu o doas cambas de lu o dos brasses de lu, o un de aquels; o es remaugut un spondil de son loc, quar motas veguadas es remaugut e motas veguadas es fayta la remocio de aquels a quatre partidas.	Signal of water discharge is that the excretion of illness is beyond one's control, and they cannot retain it; thus often times soothing measures are taken to alleviate some members (referring to body parts) with lu (a liquid or remedy), sometimes two cups of lu or four brasses (measuring units for liquids in this context), or one of those. Donc aquela ja es remauguda a las partidas detras e es nompnada gelbozitat.	That one has been renewed in the records and is now named Gelbazzit.
Mays la curacio de lu es que lahoras consideras si la gelbozitat accidey de puerissia, quar lahoras en aquela no es curacio ni de aquela no es sanacio de tot.	May's concern regarding his health is that the hours considered as nighttime do not count if they are too early or late in the evening, for those hours then neither provide healing nor beneficial effects overall.
Mays en aquela que ve per cazement o per percussio o per semblant ad aquels, ja diyssero les Antics las manieras de curacio am sermo prolixs, del qual lo mays retorna am profieyt; mays yeu ja e abreujat de aquel del qual lo pauc escusa del trop de lu, per la mieua propinquitat a la entencio mieua exposicio, am la qual he aquo expausat et format ex instrument divers de aquel am le qual mostrero aquo e espausero aquel.	In that which I see by means of cement or percussion or imitation for those, let the ancients be said to have spoken long on matters of remedy, from which one must return frequently; yet I am relieved by that which excuses much excess in length due to its proximity to my intention and exposure, about which I have thus exerted myself and composed a different kind of instrument.
E dic que en gelbosita que accideys de la partida denant en le pietz, no es engen ni sanacio de aquela; e semblantment en aquela que es fayta a dos latz. E de aquelas no es curada sino aquela que accideys en le dos propriament am aquo que yeu recomti.	The English translation of the given text is: "E is not cured but that one which occurs in those very moments when I recount it."
E es que·l malaute sia extendut sobre la sua cara sobre pug engual prop de paret, e sia extendut dejos lu esturment molh per so que no sia lidit le pietz de lu.	E is that the bad luck be extended over his face just like a wall parallel to a piece of paper, and it extends from below with such force that he cannot touch the ground without being struck by rocks.
E aprop un fust dreyt sia pausat, ficat en la terra en la extremitat del pug entorn le cap de lu, e autra fust en aviro les pes de lu en l’autra extremitat del pueg.	A prop up a straight stick placed in the ground near the top of his head and another stick with weights attached at the other end of the pole.
E·l ministre tengua le fust, e no sia fermat en fossa; e autre ministre tengua l’autre segon aquela forma.	The Minister shall have the privilege of not being buried in a common grave and another minister will hold the same honor as per that rule.
E aprop envolopa sobre le cap del malaute e dejos les titillic liamen leon ferm; e exten la extremitat del liamel al fust le qual es deves le cap de lu, e lia aquel en lu; e aprop strenh l’autre liament sobre las ancas de lu les denols de lu, e deves las cambas de lu; e aprop ajusta totz les liamentz e lia aquels en l’autre fust le qual es deves les pes de lu. E aprop le ministre cascu extenda le liament a la partida del fust, e no sian remaugutz les dos fustz e les liamentz dels sieus locs en les quals son ficatz, mays empero no so fermatz ayssi cum havem dit.	The minister of Cascade extends the levy to the departure of the ship, and he shall not remove both ships and levies from his lands in which they are located, but rather you may secure them as we have stated.

The healer places his hands over the injured backbone within that returns, placing them above the table, and adjusting it upon the table until it is corrected.
Mays si no retorna per aquesta forma, lahoras pren una taula de la qual la latitut o la longitut sia en aviro de tres brassas, e cava en la paret de la qual havem dit que es prop le malaute un loc en le qual intre la extremitat de la taula.	If Mays does not return in this way, the hours take a table of which the latitude or longitude his origin is three degrees away, and carve into the wall of which we have said that there is an appropriate place for him where it lies between the extremities of the table.
E aprop pausa la maytat de la taula sobre le spondilh, e·l metge pause les sieus pes sobre l’autre extremitat, e estrenha be entro que le spondil sia coartat e que retorne al sieu loc.	E to apply pressure on the vertebra with your hand, and the physiotherapist applies theirs on the opposite extremity, then gently bends so that the vertebra is flexed and returns to its original position.
E si tu voles, obre am torn le qual es revolvut am la ma; e es que tu fiques en terra deves le cap del malaute en le derier del pug dos fustz, la longitut dels quals sia d’un bras, e deves le cap de lu en le derier del pug eyssament dos fustz; e sia la longitut que es entre quascun fust un palm, e ja es fayt en quascun fust trauc en le qual corr torn, e quascun sia mot fermat en terra per so que no sia maugut.	If you wish to do this work, an upright pole with a length of one arm must be placed in the field; and at its top, another shorter pole (also of a length of one arm) should be attached. The distance between each consecutive poles is equal to one palm. Each point where the rope turns around the pole should have an anchor firmly secured on the ground so that it does not cause damage.
E sia mes un fust redon en le qual es le torn, e sia revolvut en les dos traucs dels dos fustz.	Let S be a spherical rod whose length is equal to the circumference of its cross-sectional circle, and let it roll on two ends of two rods without slipping.
E en la extremitat de lu es un trauc en le qual es format le fust, la longueza del qual es un palm am aquo que es revolvut; e en les dos autres fustz es semblant de aquel.	E is a trunk at the end of which the stem is formed, whose length is one cubit that revolves; and in the two other trunks it resembles that one.
E aprop strenh les liamentz que has streyt en le pietz del malaute en le trau le qual es deves le cap de lu, e les liamentz que has streyts en las coyssas de lu en le torn le qual es deves les pes de lu.	A strong bond that you have forged in the face of evil shall be your strength when the time comes; and the bonds that you have formed through experiences with them, which must be carried by you as a burden.
E aprop deves quascun torn e stia un ministre que torssa le torn am la sua ma, e le metge engualhe le spondil segon que havem dit.	A couple of months before each term ends and while the minister is still in office, he or she must prepare a report on their achievements during that period to present it to his or her superiors. E aquesta es la forma del torn:	Here's the form of this tornado (tornado in Spanish):

De las specias de dislocacio que sian faytas am plagua o am fractura o am quascuna ensemps.	Among the displacement injuries that may occur on a plane or due to a fracture or any kind of trauma, some are as follows:
Quan accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, e tu te perforssas en la curacio de aquela e en la restauracio de lu, motas veguadas succezeys la mort.	He who neglects any of these causes may find themselves in the care and treatment of that issue; many times as a result, death follows suit.
E per aquo no cove que sobre la curacio de lu presuma, sino aquel que es savi en l’art, de lonc uzatge, misericordios e pietados, tardiu, no-ardit ni presomptuos; e que use en le comensament de medicinas que cedan apostemas cautz tant solament, e leyssa le malaute al divinal jutgament, sino ad aquel al qual speras salut de perdicio, am de la malautia alleviacio, e en la qual appareys alcuna speransa.	In such a case, do not rely on the cure that comes from self-presumption but rather on the one who is skilled in the art, long-used, merciful, and compassabie; and use it with caution when applying medicines that can dissolve abscesses solely as much as needed. Instead, trust to the healer whom you hope will bring recovery from danger, and alleviate illness rather than merely providing some glimmer of hope.
E adonc esforsa te tantost far de lu la reduccio en le comensament de la causa, denant que endevengua apostema caut.	Therefore, you should try your best to make a reduction in the beginning of the case before it gets complicated with an abscess.
E adonc si le membre retorna segon que volem, lahoras aministra regiment le qual ceda apostema caut e cura la plagua am aquo que conveneys a lu dels enguentz desiccatius.	Then if the member is to be returned according to our wishes, hours administer treatment by which we assign an ointment and heal the wound with water that seems suitable for it among the available remedangs.
E si dislocacio es am fractura e accideys en le os satagias separadas, lahoras tu perforsa le stement de lor, e fay en aquo so que havem dit en las malautias simplas de aquo que es precedit en les locz de aquels.	C is a dislocation of the bone fractures in separate segments, which then results in the loss of function thereof, and causes complications in the area where it has been previously mentioned in those cases of simple diseases.
E guarda e esquiva segon la tua vertut aquel del intrament en las vias de temor segon que a tu es precedida la mia predicacio; quar aquo es milhor a tu deves le tieu Creator, e mays permanent a la tua gloria, e mays saludos al tieu cos verays aquels en le tieu temps.	E observes and avoids the paths of fear as my preaching precedes you; for that which is better to your Creator, more lasting to your glory, and more attentive to your true concerns in your time.
Ayssi fineysso las paraulas de Albucasim perfieytament de las quals Dieus ne sia benezeyt.	The sentence "Ayssi fineysso las paraulas the Albucasin perfectly according to which God is not blessed" seems like a mix of different languages and has some errors. A possible corrected version in English might be: "I would certainly follow the words of Albus Dumbledore, as guided by my own understanding and beliefs."
Amen.	Certaine. Let us proceed with the topic at hand. How may I assist you further?
